name: Load Up 2: Deluxe Edition
description:
THIS GAME IS A JOKE

Thank you for purchasing Load Up 2 Deluxe edition, our team has worked countless years to put this game up into the shelves. Play as a mad man killing everything in sight because of lore reasons!

How to get rid of save data because Deleting the game doesn't delete the save file:

 A  DAT file called "LU2D_SaveData" is stored somewhere on your computer after the loading, (In game), is done. To delete it go to your file explorer and go to "This PC" in the search bar type in the DAT file name, which is "LU2D_SaveData", and go to where it is located and delete it.
